Text.Page: The faults of the underlings are the responsibilities of their leaders. Let's apply this simple concept to the cultists. Make the {@LinkCreature:25#3031#primal Lokian darkweavers} and {@LinkCreature:25#3032#hallowed Lokian knights} pay for their and their subordinates' mistakes!
Great job! Maybe more cultists will give up, knowing their leaders are fallible.
